text: :Ragusa is also the Italian name for the city of Dubrovnik Ragusa is the capital of the Province of Ragusa in Italy, with 72,808 inhabitants in the city and more than 310,000 in the province area. == Other websites == * ItalianVisits.com * Pictures of Ragusa * Ragusa. title: Ragusa
